mobile_center.label: On mobile, content is always centered

mobile_middle.label: On mobile, content is always middle

mobile_center.label: On mobile, content is always centered

height_auto.label: Enter the "0" value to set the height as auto

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the popup always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Production mode".

header_currency.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header_language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

colors.name: Colors
colors.label: Color scheme
colors.info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

body_font.label: Font
body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

heading_font.label: Font
heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

map_api.label: Google maps API key
map_api.info: You'll need to register a [Google Maps API Key](https://console.developers.google.com) to display the map

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

card_low_stock.label: Low inventory threshold
card_low_stock.info: Show inventory quantity in red when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

card_show_rating.label: Show rating
card_show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

text.info: Text inside square brackets will be displayed differently from other words. [Learn more](https://boostifythemes.com/docs/neat-shopify/classic-settings/how-do-i-set-up-marquee-text/)

custom-liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom-liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

accordion.label: Collapsible block content on mobile devices
accordion.info: If select Yes, the block content will be hidden by default

show_follow.label: Enable Follow on Shop
show_follow.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

mega_item.label: Parent item
mega_item.info: Enter item name to apply a mega navigation dropdown

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
overlay_opacity.info: Darkens your image to ensure your text is readable

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
overlay_opacity.info: Darkens your image to ensure your text is readable

button_url.label: Button link
button_url.info: Links to background videos will be opened in a video player

overlay.label: Overlay opacity
overlay.info: Darkens your image to ensure your text is readable

time_init.label: Time init (Second)
time_init.info: When your site loads, the notification will show after this amount of time.

time_next.label: Time for next display (Second)
time_next.info: Set the time to show the following notification, after the previous one is hidden.

virtual_customers.label: Customers
virtual_customers.info: Separate by "|". If you do not want to use this list of customers, you can write some text. Eg: "someone".

paragraph.content: The Sticky toolbar only shows on mobile devices.

Ask your customers for consent to use cookies and process their data, as required by the European Union's ePrivacy Directive and General Data Protection Regulation. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/your-account/privacy/GDPR)

width.label: Content width
width.info: On mobile, this option will be set to auto

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

color_overlay.label: Color overlay
color_overlay.info: Darkens your image to ensure your text is readable

first_visit.label: First visit
first_visit.info: Show newsletter popup only on the first visit

delay_time.label: Delay time
delay_time.info: Delay time to show newsletter popup

rating_info.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

info.content: Show customers where they can pick up the product. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup#show-pickup-availability-to-your-customers)

picker_type.label: Type
picker_type.info: Swatches will display if set to 'Swatches'. [Learn how to set up swatches](https://boostifythemes.com/docs/neat-shopify/classic-settings/support-how-do-i-set-up-swatches/)

swatch.label: Swatches
swatch.info: This option only supports the type Button.

swatch_style.label: Swatch style
swatch_style.info: This option only supports the type Button.

swatch_size.label: Swatch size
swatch_size.info: This option only supports the type Button.

dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom-liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom-liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

time.label: Time
time.info: Set the end of the countdown. Format: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS

info.content: Show customers where they can pick up the product. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup#show-pickup-availability-to-your-customers)

picker_type.label: Type
picker_type.info: Swatches will display if set to 'Swatches'. [Learn how to set up swatches](https://boostifythemes.com/docs/neat-shopify/classic-settings/support-how-do-i-set-up-swatches/)

swatch_size.label: Swatch size
swatch_size.info: This option only supports the Swatch type.

dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

low_stock.label: Low inventory threshold
low_stock.info: Show inventory quantity in red when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom-liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom-liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Visible when collapsible row is displayed.

paragraph.content: This tab will show the product's description.
This section requires a product reviews app to work. Such as Shopify product reviews, Growave, Judge.me, Loox...

content.label: Custom liquid
content.info: Paste the liquid code of the app review here

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

paragraph_1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)
Only be visible if at least one product has been viewed.

map_coordinates.label: Map coordinates
map_coordinates.info: Enter coordinates to find a place. [Learn how to get your address coordinates.](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539)

collection.label: Featured collection
collection.info: Show a featured collection before the predictive search results are displayed.

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
overlay_opacity.info: Darkens your image to ensure your text is readable

paragraph.content: These color options only work on desktop
